//   Name                    Reg   Size
//   ----------------------- ----- ----
//   g_BloomStarSampleWeight c150     2
//   sampDif0                s0       1
//   sampDif1                s1       1
//

    ps_3_0
    dcl_texcoord v0.xy
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    texld r0, v0, s1
    mul r0, r0, c151
    texld r1, v0, s0
    mad_pp oC0, c150, r1, r0

// approximately 4 instruction slots used (2 texture, 2 arithmetic)
